options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

properties.name: toolDescription
properties.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

properties.displayName: This node connects to the Microsoft 365 cloud platform. Use the 'Extract from File' and 'Convert to File' nodes to directly manipulate spreadsheet files (.xls, .csv, etc). More info.
properties.name: notice

options.name: Table
options.description: Represents an Excel table

options.name: Workbook
options.description: A workbook is the top level object which contains one or more worksheets

options.name: Sheet
options.description: A sheet is a grid of cells which can contain data, tables, charts, etc

options.name: Append
options.description: Add rows to the end of the table

options.name: Convert to Range
options.description: Convert a table to a range

options.name: Create
options.description: Add a table based on range

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a table

options.name: Get Columns
options.description: Retrieve a list of table columns

options.name: Get Rows
options.description: Retrieve a list of table rows

options.name: Lookup
options.description: Look for rows that match a given value in a column

options.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
options.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

options.name: Map Each Column Below
options.description: Set the value for each destination column

options.name: Raw
options.description: Send raw data as JSON

properties.name: data
properties.description: Raw values for the specified range as array of string arrays in JSON format

values.name: column
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: index
options.description: Specifies the relative position of the new row. If not defined, the addition happens at the end. Any row below the inserted row will be shifted downwards. First row index is 0.

options.name: rawData
options.description: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header

options.name: dataProperty
options.description: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data

options.name: Automatically
options.description: The whole used range on the selected sheet will be converted into a table

options.name: Manually
options.description: Select a range that will be converted into a table

properties.name: range
properties.description: The range of cells that will be converted to a table

properties.name: hasHeaders
properties.description: Whether the range has column labels. When this property set to false Excel will automatically generate header shifting the data down by one row.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: rawData
properties.description: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header

properties.name: dataProperty
properties.description: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of the fields to include in the response

properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: rawData
properties.description: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header

properties.name: dataProperty
properties.description: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of the fields to include in the response

options.name: column
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: lookupColumn
properties.description: The name of the column in which to look for value

properties.name: lookupValue
properties.description: The value to look for in column

options.name: returnAllMatches
options.description: By default only the first result gets returned. If options gets set all found matches get returned.

options.name: Add Sheet
options.description: Add a new sheet to the workbook
options.action: Add a sheet to a workbook

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete workbook

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get workbooks

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the sheet to be added. The name should be unique. If not specified, Excel will determine the name of the new worksheet.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of the fields to include in the response

options.name: Append
options.description: Append data to sheet

options.name: Append or Update
options.description: Append a new row or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)

options.name: Clear
options.description: Clear sheet

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete sheet

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get a list of sheets

options.name: Get Rows
options.description: Retrieve a list of sheet rows

options.name: Update
options.description: Update rows of a sheet or sheet range

options.name: rawData
options.description: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header

options.name: dataProperty
options.description: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data

options.name: All
options.description: Clear data in cells and remove all formatting

options.name: Formats
options.description: Clear formatting(e.g. font size, color) of cells

options.name: Contents
options.description: Clear data contained in cells

properties.name: range
properties.description: The sheet range that would be cleared, specified using a A1-style notation

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: fields
options.description: A comma-separated list of the fields to include in the response

properties.name: range
properties.description: The sheet range to read the data from specified using a A1-style notation, has to be specific e.g A1:B5, generic ranges like A:B are not supported
properties.hint: Leave blank to return entire sheet

properties.name: keyRow
properties.hint: Index of the row which contains the column names
properties.description: Relative to selected 'Range', first row index is 0

properties.name: dataStartRow
properties.hint: Index of first row which contains the actual data
properties.description: Relative to selected 'Range', first row index is 0

options.name: rawData
options.description: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header

options.name: dataProperty
options.description: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields the response will containt. Multiple can be added separated by ,.

properties.name: range
properties.description: The sheet range to read the data from specified using a A1-style notation, has to be specific e.g A1:B5, generic ranges like A:B are not supported. Leave blank to use whole used range in the sheet.
properties.hint: First row must contain column names

properties.description: The sheet range to read the data from specified using a A1-style notation

options.description: Send raw data as JSON, the whole selected range would be updated with the new values

properties.name: data
properties.description: Raw values for the specified range as array of string arrays in JSON format. Should match the specified range: one array item for each row.

properties.name: columnToMatchOn
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
properties.hint: Used to find the correct row to update. Doesn't get changed.

properties.displayName: Value of Column to Match On

options.description: Whether to update all matching rows or just the first match
